I'm seeking someone to create a straightforward automation workflow to streamline our internal daily reporting process.

Here‚Äôs the goal: employees will complete a form each day to log what they've worked on. Their responses should automatically populate a Google Sheet. One of the form fields will be an open-ended text area where team members describe their tasks for the day. This free-text content needs to be automatically summarized, capturing only the main points, and the summary should appear in a separate column within the same sheet.

The spreadsheet will also include standard fields such as date, employee name, and department, but the core focus is on automating both the data collection and the summarization steps.

I'm flexible with tools, Google Forms, Typeform, n8n, or any similar platform is fine. For summarizing the text, using OpenAI or another reliable summarization solution is perfectly acceptable

üîç Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled n8n developer to build two advanced, production-ready automation workflows focused on content generation and backlink crawling.

This is a performance-critical build. The workflows must be scalable, clean, and optimized for high-volume execution.

‚úÖ Workflow 1 ‚Äì AI-Powered Content Generator
Build a workflow that uses OpenAI‚Äôs GPT models (GPT-4o, 4o Mini, or 4.1 Mini) to generate thousands of SEO-optimized articles.

Key Requirements:

Manual form or spreadsheet input for:

Campaign folder name

Topic

Keywords

Article count

Tone (selectable: professional, persuasive, etc.)

Tier level (Tier 1 = plain, Tier 2 = Spintax)

Generates eight hundred to one thousand word articles in valid HTML with proper headings

Optional GPT-based Spintax spinning for Tier 2 content

Multi-API key support (load-balanced or round-robin)

Batch execution and parallel processing

MD5 or equivalent deduplication logic

Retry logic and error handling

Local file storage on a Windows machine (e.g., C:\Content\CampaignName\)

Optional Spintax validator to ensure output integrity

‚úÖ Workflow 2 ‚Äì Backlink Crawler / Pinger (No Footprint)
Build a secondary workflow to safely crawl and ping large volumes of backlinks to simulate indexing behavior.

Requirements:

GET requests to URLs with randomized user agents, headers, and referrers

Optional proxy rotation support

Lightweight footprint (avoid obvious automation signatures)

Optional scheduling or throttling to prevent overload

Simple CSV or text input list for crawl targets

üéØ Ideal Candidate Has:
Deep experience building complex n8n workflows

Solid knowledge of OpenAI‚Äôs GPT models and token usage

Familiarity with Spintax formatting and bulk content automation

JavaScript/Node.js experience for use in Function nodes

Understanding of HTTP headers, crawling, and stealth techniques

Experience working with Windows-based file systems

üìÅ Deliverables:
Two production-ready n8n workflows (.json exports)

Bulk Article Generator (with Spintax for Tier 2)

No-footprint Backlink Crawler

Sample test runs with sample folders and outputs

Light documentation for how to use and adjust workflows

üí¨ To Be Considered, Please Include:
Examples of past n8n workflows or automations you've built

Details on your experience with OpenAI or content automation

Your preferred pricing model (fixed or hourly)

Estimated timeframe to deliver both workflows

This project is for automation professionals only ‚Äî please apply if you've built serious production-level n8n workflows.

We‚Äôre building an AI-powered messaging assistant using a visual automation platform and AI text generation tools, and we need help solving a specific behavior.

üß† The Challenge

When users send several short messages in a row (e.g., ‚Äúhi‚Äù ‚Üí ‚Äúquick question‚Äù ‚Üí ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the price?‚Äù), our system currently responds to each message individually.
This results in multiple robotic replies instead of one natural answer.

We want to improve the experience by:
‚Ä¢ Waiting briefly after each incoming message
‚Ä¢ Collecting all messages sent during that short window
‚Ä¢ Sending one smart, combined reply using AI-generated text

‚∏ª

‚úÖ Your Goal

Design and help us implement a solution that:
‚Ä¢ Waits for a short time (e.g. 60 seconds) after each message
‚Ä¢ Collects messages sent in that window
‚Ä¢ Sends one natural, AI-generated reply when the user stops typing
‚Ä¢ Uses only workflow automation tools and AI modules
‚Ä¢ Avoids any time-based schedulers or loops
‚Ä¢ Is event-driven, simple to maintain, and cost-efficient
‚Ä¢ Prevents double replies and handles timing correctly

‚∏ª

üß∞ What We‚Äôre Using (Tools)

We‚Äôll be working with:
‚Ä¢ A visual workflow builder that supports webhooks, data storage, HTTP modules, and delay logic
‚Ä¢ A conversational messaging platform with automation support
‚Ä¢ AI text generation tools (e.g., completion API) integrated inside our workflow scenarios

We‚Äôll share specifics with shortlisted candidates.

‚∏ª

ü§ù What You‚Äôll Do
‚Ä¢ Review our current automation flow (we‚Äôll provide access or diagrams)
‚Ä¢ Suggest one or two smart architecture options (preferably event-driven)
‚Ä¢ Help implement the core logic, or guide our dev team
‚Ä¢ Help shape the AI text generation prompt for better replies
‚Ä¢ Optional: Add simple logging and error fallback logic
